general_advisory: The mean maximum daily temperature was 30.1°C and the mean minimum daily temperature was 21.4°C in Jagatsinghpur district during the last week. The district received no rainfall in the last seven days. Therefore, continue transplanting summer paddy and sow summer pulses, oilseed, and vegetables. Harvest mustard, til, and groundnut. Crop coverage is 86% of the total program area with a normal overall crop condition. Forecast for the next 5 days includes light rainfall on Saturday & Sunday, clear to generally cloudy sky conditions, and wind speeds within 12-30 km/h.

advisory: If pre-emergence herbicides were not applied in paddy, controlling weeds by spraying Bispyribacsodium @ 120 ml /acre, Penoxsulum 1.02% + Cyhalofop-butyl 5.1 %, etc.
To manage Bacterial Leaf Blight in paddy, spray Copper Hydroxide 53.8% DF, CopperOxy Chloride 50% WP, etc.
Fertilizer Application (Active Tillering) - Apply 35 kg Urea per acre at 3 weeks after transplanting
Yellow Stem Borer management - Apply Cartap Hydrochloride 4 % G, Fipronil 0.3 % GR, etc.
February-March is the ideal time for sowing of Cowpe a and Cluster bean
Harvest the mustard crop as soon as the pods turn yellowish-brown
To manage Tobacco Caterpillar pest in Groundnut, Blackgram, Greengram, surveil and destroy egg mass and caterpillar of the pest
SUGARCANE Sett Rot management - Basal drenching with Carbendazim 12% + Mancozeb 63%, foliar spray with Metalaxyl 8% + Mancozeb 64% WP
Little Leaf of Brinjal - To manage little leaf in brinjal, remove and destroy infected plants, and spray Thiamethoxam 25% WG, Flonicamid 50% WG, etc.
Leaf Webber and Head Borer management - Regular monitoring of pest infestation, collect and destroy caterpillars, and spray Neem based Pesticide, Tolfenpyrad 15 % EC, etc.
